title: Turkey kicks off offensive in northeast Syria
text:
People stand at a back of a truck as they flee Ras al Ain town, Syria, October 9, 2019. Turkish troops and their Syrian rebel allies attacked Kurdish militia in northeast Syria pounding them with air strikes and artillery before launching a...more

People stand at a back of a truck as they flee Ras al Ain town, Syria, October 9, 2019. Turkish troops and their Syrian rebel allies attacked Kurdish militia in northeast Syria pounding them with air strikes and artillery before launching a cross-border ground operation that could transform an eight-year-old war. REUTERS/Rodi Said

Close
